document_metadata.title: EP-BERTGCN: A Simple but Effective Power Equipment Fault Recognition Method

base_methods.evidence_text: Our work spans text-based power equipment fault recognition, graph neural networks, pre-trained BERT, and cross-domain BERT adaption. Previous research in power equipment fault recognition has largely focused on image modalities, with recent inroads into text-based models for TPFR. Graph Convolutional Neural Network (GCN) has been applied to text classification by constructing graphs based on textual relationships. This approach is extended with the integration of pre-trained BERT and domain-specific adaption in our EP-BERTGCN method.
EP-BERTGCN constructs a graph among documents and words using pre-trained BERT and combines softmax outputs from BERT and GCNs for classification.
